title: The Wrath of Raghnall
description: Four legends.Two households.One crown.Being the sole survivor of the raids that took the lives of her mother and brothers, Freya Raghnall is out for vengeance.Finn Olden is the family rogue. Never taking to the gentry after discovering their involvement with his uncles' deaths. He demands answers.She is her mother's daughter.He is the Reaper's nephew.United, they will find those responsible.Together, they will burn the world to ash.
author: Shauna Richmond
